original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.12. Hetuduka, Parittattika🔽Nahetuṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)🔽Hetuṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka paritta ttika  na hetum parittam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi  hetum mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
